snippet: Mrs. Manford, whose son, a gay-rights advocate, was beaten in 1972, founded Parents, Families and Friends of Lesbians and Gays.
abstract: Jeanne Manford, Queens elementary school teacher whose defense of her openly gay son Morty was galvanizing moment in gay rights movement of 1970s, dies at age 92.
lead_paragraph: Mrs. Manford, whose son, a gay-rights advocate, was beaten in 1972, founded Parents, Families and Friends of Lesbians and Gays.

headline.seo: Jeanne Manford, Gay-Rights Advocate, Dies at 92
headline.main: Jeanne Manford, 92, Who Stood Up for Her Gay Son, Inspiring Others, Dies
headline.print_headline: Jeanne Manford, 92, Who Stood Up For Her Gay Son, Inspiring Others, Dies
